subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh had 25 points and 14 rebounds, and the Toronto Raptors ended a six-game losing streak with a 95-87 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers Wednesday night.
snippet: Chris Bosh had 25 points and 14 rebounds, and the Toronto Raptors ended a six-game losing streak with a 95-87 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers Wednesday night.
